title: I want get PBE server!
body: Hi League of Legend! I am broadcaster in korea. I want to ger PBE server bacause I want to show new skin or new champion to Korean. Please~!!

replies.body: PBE applications are currently being accepted for accounts in good standing.  You can sign up [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)!  Good luck with your application!
my account is in good standing where is my pbe account?

We can't guarantee or expedite applications.  While being in good standing is a requirement, it does not guarantee acceptance.  More information on this is available in our[ PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  Good luck!
On an semi-unrelated note, where is the PBE server located?
